document.full_text: flood fighters patrolled strained levees on a red river tributary and an old dam on a northwest north dakota river on thursday as forecasters reduced the projected crest in grand forks.
document.title: grand forks flood crest lowered; national guard patrol
lines_and_colors: flood fighters patrolled strained levees on a red river tributary and an old dam on a northwest north dakota river on thursday as forecasters reduced the projected crest in grand forks.
